name: Shift Host Node
postCreateCommand: until curl -fsSL "$GATEWAY_URL/api/internal/download-agent" -o agent.js; do echo 'Waiting for Gateway...'; sleep 5; done
postStartCommand: nohup bash -c 'echo "[INIT] Starting background task..." > /tmp/agent.log; while ! docker info >> /tmp/agent.log 2>&1; do echo "[INIT] Waiting for Docker..." >> /tmp/agent.log; sleep 2; done; echo "[INIT] Docker is up. Starting agent..." >> /tmp/agent.log; while true; do node /workspaces/dlxs-agent/agent.js >> /tmp/agent.log 2>&1; echo "[WARN] Agent crashed. Restarting in 5s..." >> /tmp/agent.log; sleep 5; done' >/dev/null 2>&1 &
